title: Dr Fauci Wants Americans to Wear Masks for 'At Least' 100 Days into Joe Biden Presidency
content:
1. Dr Fauci Wants Americans to Wear Masks for 'At Least' 100 Days into Joe Biden Presidency  Newsweek

  4. U.S. reports more than 4,000 Covid deaths for first time as outbreak grows worse than ever  CNBC
